text.en: In the sky in front, amidst a captivating expanse of dense rainbow light,
text.en-trans: dün khar yitrok ja ö trikpé long

text.en: Upon a lion throne and seats of lotus and lunar disc
Is my own root guru in the form of the protector Amitābha,
Entirely surrounded by oceanic hosts of the sources of refuge.
text.en-trans: kyabné gyatsö tsok kyi yong korwa

text.en: All of them abide with loving affection for me,
The object of focus, and all beings.
text.en-trans: jesu tsewé tsul gyi zhukpar gyur

text.en: Now that this object of focus, who has not yet put a stop to the delusory perceptions
Of birth, death and the bardo, has passed on, let their consciousness
text.en-trans: mikyul tsedé di yi namshé ni

text.en: Be transferred through the path of deathlessness like a shooting star
text.en-trans: chimé lam né karda powa zhin

text.en: And dissolve into the precious guru’s heart.
Through the compassionate blessings of the oceanic sources of refuge
And the power of this yogi’s pure altruistic intention,
text.en-trans: naljor dak gi lhaksam dakpé tü

text.en: May their deluded mind and the precious guru’s wisdom
text.en-trans: trulpé sem dang jetsün lamé tuk

text.en: Rest without contrivance in non-dual great equanimity: āḥ!
May this be the cause of purifying negative karma, misdeeds and obscurations,
text.en-trans: gyu dé lé ngen dikdrib kün jang né

text.en: So that the terrifying delusory appearances of the bardos do not arise,
And this person may continue their pursuit of virtue in a pure realm
text.en-trans: dakpé zhing du gewé trotü dé
